section.title: Garbage Collection
section.para: Tuning the JVM garbage collection (GC) can greatly improve Jetty performance. Specifically, you can avoid pauses while the system performs full garbage collections. Optimal tuning of the GC depends on the behaviour of the application and requires detailed analysis, however there are general recommendations.
